1. Lords of the Fallen publisher says it won’t integrate ‘social or political agencies’ into its games  Video Games Chronicle

  5. ‘Lords Of The Fallen’ Developer Promises They “Will Not Be Integrating Any Social Or Political Agendas” Into Their Games  Bounding Into Comics

item.description:
